title: Login issue - unable to access account
description: Customer unable to log into the web application. This prevents access to their dashboard and ongoing work.

title: Payment failure - transaction not processed
description: Payment not processing through credit card gateway. Customers cannot complete purchases, leading to potential revenue loss.

title: Slow dashboard loading - delayed reports
description: Dashboard takes more than 20 seconds to load. Users experience frustration and reduced productivity.

title: Email not received - password reset blocked
description: Customer not receiving password reset emails. This blocks account recovery and increases support requests.

title: Mobile app crash - login failure
description: App crashes on Android 14 after login attempt. Users cannot use the mobile app, affecting engagement.

title: UI alignment issue - poor mobile experience
description: Buttons overlap on small screen devices. Users find the interface confusing, impacting usability.

title: Data sync problem - inconsistent information
description: Data not syncing between web and mobile app. Users see outdated information, affecting decision-making.

title: Incorrect invoice - billing confusion
description: Customer received wrong billing amount in invoice. May lead to disputes and trust issues with clients.

title: Search not working - unable to find products
description: Search feature returning no results. Users cannot locate products, potentially lowering sales.

title: Notifications delayed - missed updates
description: Push notifications arrive several hours late. Important alerts are missed, reducing app reliability.

title: Profile update failed - cannot personalize account
description: User unable to update profile picture and details. This affects personalization and user satisfaction.

title: Order tracking issue - shipment status unclear
description: Order status not updating after shipment. Customers are unable to track deliveries, increasing support requests.

title: Security alert - unauthorized login detected
description: Customer reported unauthorized login attempt. This poses a risk to account security and requires urgent action.

title: Subscription not activated - payment processed but no access
description: Paid subscription not reflecting in account. Users cannot access premium features, leading to dissatisfaction.
